amp.description: Absolute amplitude, 0–100 % ×10 (0.1 % resolution). Zero‑padded to 4 digits (e.g. 0890 = 89.0 %).

sur.description: Surround depth; 00 = mono, 10 = full 7.1. Two digits (e.g. 07).

head.description: Headroom before limiting in dB, 0–60. Two digits (e.g. 12 = 12 dB).

description: Prefix (VOL) + amp (4) + LR (3) + surround (2) + headroom (2); all zero‑padded, no subvar prefixes.
